languages.text: "Я же не безумец. Это — крепкая отрава, но она тебя не убьет... Не должна, по крайней мере. Но разум может затянуть морок грез. Не верь всему, что увидишь — может, видения, что явятся, будут посланы Всеотцом, а может — кем-то менее достойным".

"I am not a madman. It is a strong brew, but it will not kill you... It shouldn't, at least. But it may envelop your mind in a haze of dreams. Do not believe everything you see — the visions may have been sent by the Allfather, or by someone less worthy."
languages.original_text: "Я же не безумец. Это — крепкая отрава, но она тебя не убьет... Не должна, по крайней мере. Но разум может затянуть морок грез. Не верь всему, что увидишь — может, видения, что явятся, будут посланы Всеотцом, а может — кем-то менее достойным".

traits.locale_text: "I am not a madman. It is a strong brew, but it will not kill you... It shouldn't, at least. But it may envelop your mind in a haze of dreams. Do not believe everything you see — the visions may have been sent by the Allfather, or by someone less worthy."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am not a madman. It is a strong brew, but it will not kill you... It shouldn't, at least. But it may envelop your mind in a haze of dreams. Do not believe everything you see — the visions may have been sent by the Allfather, or by someone less worthy."

traits.locale_text: "I am not a madman. It is a strong brew, but it will not kill you... It shouldn't, at least. But it may envelop your mind in a haze of dreams. Do not believe everything you see — the visions may have been sent by the Allfather, or by someone less worthy."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我并没有发疯。这酒很烈，但不会要你的命……应该不会。不过，它会让你陷入迷梦之中。无论你看到什么，都不要相信。那些幻象可能是全父派来的，也可能是某个卑鄙小人派来的。”
languages.original_text: "I am not a madman. It is a strong brew, but it will not kill you... It shouldn't, at least. But it may envelop your mind in a haze of dreams. Do not believe everything you see — the visions may have been sent by the Allfather, or by someone less worthy."

traits.locale_text: “我并没有发疯。这酒很烈，但不会要你的命……应该不会。不过，它会让你陷入迷梦之中。无论你看到什么，都不要相信。那些幻象可能是全父派来的，也可能是某个卑鄙小人派来的。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「血迷っちゃいないよ。こいつは強い飲み物だが死にはしない…はずだ、一応。だが、こいつはお前の頭を夢の霧で包んでくれるかもしれないぞ。見えるものを何でも信じるな…幻を見せるのは全知の父か、それには数段劣る者だ」
languages.original_text: "I am not a madman. It is a strong brew, but it will not kill you... It shouldn't, at least. But it may envelop your mind in a haze of dreams. Do not believe everything you see — the visions may have been sent by the Allfather, or by someone less worthy."

traits.locale_text: 「血迷っちゃいないよ。こいつは強い飲み物だが死にはしない…はずだ、一応。だが、こいつはお前の頭を夢の霧で包んでくれるかもしれないぞ。見えるものを何でも信じるな…幻を見せるのは全知の父か、それには数段劣る者だ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «No soy ningún loco. Es una bebida fuerte, pero no le matará... Por lo menos, no debería. Eso sí, es posible que suma su mente en una neblina de sueños. No crea todo lo que vea... las visiones pueden ser enviadas por el Padre de todas las cosas, o por alguien menos digno».
languages.original_text: "I am not a madman. It is a strong brew, but it will not kill you... It shouldn't, at least. But it may envelop your mind in a haze of dreams. Do not believe everything you see — the visions may have been sent by the Allfather, or by someone less worthy."

traits.locale_text: «No soy ningún loco. Es una bebida fuerte, pero no le matará... Por lo menos, no debería. Eso sí, es posible que suma su mente en una neblina de sueños. No crea todo lo que vea... las visiones pueden ser enviadas por el Padre de todas las cosas, o por alguien menos digno».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas fou. C'est une boisson puissante, mais elle ne vous tuera pas... normalement. Elle risque toutefois d'envelopper votre esprit dans une voile de visions oniriques. Ne croyez pas tout ce que vous verrez. Il se pourrait que certaines de ces visions vous soient envoyées par le Père de Tous et d'autres par quelqu'un... de moins noble. »
languages.original_text: "I am not a madman. It is a strong brew, but it will not kill you... It shouldn't, at least. But it may envelop your mind in a haze of dreams. Do not believe everything you see — the visions may have been sent by the Allfather, or by someone less worthy."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas fou. C'est une boisson puissante, mais elle ne vous tuera pas... normalement. Elle risque toutefois d'envelopper votre esprit dans une voile de visions oniriques. Ne croyez pas tout ce que vous verrez. Il se pourrait que certaines de ces visions vous soient envoyées par le Père de Tous et d'autres par quelqu'un... de moins noble. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin nicht verrückt. Das Gebräu ist stark, wird Euch aber nicht umbringen ... Sollte es zumindest nicht. Aber es könnte Euren Geist mit Träumen umnebeln. Glaubt nicht alles, was Ihr seht – die Visionen können vom Allvater kommen, aber auch von jemandem, der weniger würdig ist."
languages.original_text: "I am not a madman. It is a strong brew, but it will not kill you... It shouldn't, at least. But it may envelop your mind in a haze of dreams. Do not believe everything you see — the visions may have been sent by the Allfather, or by someone less worthy."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nicht verrückt. Das Gebräu ist stark, wird Euch aber nicht umbringen ... Sollte es zumindest nicht. Aber es könnte Euren Geist mit Träumen umnebeln. Glaubt nicht alles, was Ihr seht – die Visionen können vom Allvater kommen, aber auch von jemandem, der weniger würdig ist."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "O kadar delirmedim. Bu karışım güçlü olsa da seni öldürmez. Öldürmemeli yani. Sadece zihnini hayallerle puslandırabilir. Gördüğün her şeye inanma. Görüler, Yücebaba veya daha değersiz biri tarafından gönderilmiş olabilir."
languages.original_text: "I am not a madman. It is a strong brew, but it will not kill you... It shouldn't, at least. But it may envelop your mind in a haze of dreams. Do not believe everything you see — the visions may have been sent by the Allfather, or by someone less worthy."

traits.locale_text: "Deli değilim. Güçlü bir karışım bu ama seni öldürmez. Öldürmemeli yani. Sadece zihnini hayallerle kaplayabilir. Gördüğün her şeye inanma. Görüler Yücebaba veya daha değersiz biri tarafından gönderilmiş olabilir."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
